fixes.name: Delta Down All CCY 10Y CAD Diff
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down All CCY 10Y CAD] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
fixes.solution_explanation: Removed Tableau comments and converted the row-level multiplication to a DAX calculated column using the table-qualified column references. Both referenced fields are row-level calculated fields, so this is implemented as a calculated column.
